description: An introduction to the advanced study of Latin, with continuous readings in selected authors combined with review of language and literary history. The course is intended as a preparation for Latin 309. By the end of the course students will have an extensive knowledge of Latin and its literature, will be versatile and independent readers, will have a good working knowledge of the resources available for analyzing and writing about Latin texts, and will be familiar with different interpretive approaches. Note: Unlike Latin 309, this course canonly be taken once.
name: INTRO ADV LATIN LIT
